mapper.sql: frh.id, frh.mainId AS "mainId", frh.projectId AS "projectId", frh.clientName AS "clientName", frh.inviteesName AS "inviteesName", frh.createDate AS "createDate", frh.invitedPosition AS "invitedPosition", frh.number AS "number", frh.amount AS "amount", frh.updateDate AS "updateDate", p.itemNo AS "project.itemNo", p.name AS "project.name"
JOIN fa_project p ON p.id = frh.projectId
